title: Up to 4 Weeks free!
posting_body: At The Landing apartments, there’s an effortlessness here that comes from connection – to the vibrant Dogpatch neighborhood, to a multitude of commute options, to your friends and neighbors.
A sense of purpose born out of thoughtful design.
Where the day begins with sunrise over the Bay, and ends with stargazing from the rooftop.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
